'''LEGO Minecraft Games Book''' is an book dedicated to small, "bite sized" [[LEGO Minecraft]] builds.

== Summary ==
{{Quote|'''Build in some time for bite-size fun with the whole family!'''

With 50 ideas for LEGOÂ® Minecraft-themed games, puzzles, and challenges, there is something to keep everyone entertained.

Grab this book and your own LEGO collection and get ready to level up the fun with your friends and family! Challenge friends to a [[Nether]] [[minecart]] race. Find the odd crafting block out. Design your own Minecraft-themed fairground and much more!

Comes with 61 Minecraft-themed LEGO elements to add to your own collection and help you play games in the book!|Book description}}

== Trivia ==

* The page Wheel of Fortune is a reference to the game show {{Wikipedia|Wheel of Fortune (American game show)|of the same name}}.
